body:
So, in light of Alexanderjoe10's post of him and some others filling in the middle on Rendezvous, some of us decided to try it on Rendezvous 3. Chaos insued from that point onwards, until one certain troll decided to break the monument. :/



I"d like to thank Chipmunks95 for starting the charge for fill it in with me, as well as izjust4fun and Crazy_Clownz for starting it on the opposite side. In addition, thanks to every other random user that pitched in!

May this map be filled in one day...

title: We (almost) did it.

replies.body: So close :c. Good luck next time!
replies.body_tagged: So close :c. Good luck next time!

replies.body: The red team had someone that destroyed the monuments just to end the construction.  Thanks for mentioning me btw!  I will mention you in my post as well!
replies.body_tagged: The red team had someone that destroyed the monuments just to end the construction.  Thanks for mentioning me btw!  I will mention you in my post as well!

replies.body:
Aw man, so close xD
Those trolls... I guess you have to deal with them x3
replies.body_tagged:
Aw man, so close xD
Those trolls... I guess you have to deal with them x3

replies.body: I don't think the guy who broke the monument was a troll, I am pretty sure he was playing the game normally.
replies.body_tagged: I don't think the guy who broke the monument was a troll, I am pretty sure he was playing the game normally.

replies.body: I remember seeing him swearing quite often, and messing up his own team's monument defenses.
